title: ReliefWeb POST API schema - job resource

url.description: Unique URL to identify the document. Use the original canonical of the document if available.

uuid.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) version 5 generated from the URL property above, with the namespace: '8e27a998-c362-5d1f-b152-d474e1d36af2'.

allOf.description: No control characters or separators except for spaces.

not.description: No leading, trailing or consecutive spaces.

source.description: Job source as a single ID from https://api.reliefweb.int/v1/sources.

body.description:
Job description in markdown or html (supported tags:


    1. ).

allOf.description: No control characters or separators except for spaces and new lines.

not.description: No leading, trailing or consecutive spaces and new lines (except at the end of a line to support markdown linebreaks).

how_to_apply.description:
Instructions on how to apply for the job in markdown or html (supported tags:


    1. ).

allOf.description: No control characters or separators except for spaces and new lines.

not.description: No leading, trailing or consecutive spaces and new lines (except at the end of a line to support markdown linebreaks).

country.description: Job country(ies) as a list of IDs from https://api.reliefweb.int/v1/countries. Leave blank for remote location, roster/roving or location to be determined.

city.description: City. Optional and only relevant when a country is also set.

allOf.description: No control characters or separators except for spaces.

not.description: No leading, trailing or consecutive spaces.

job_type.description: Job type as a single ID from https://api.reliefweb.int/v1/references/job-types.

job_experience.description: Job experience as a single ID from https://api.reliefweb.int/v1/references/job-experience.

career_categories.description: Job career category as a single ID from https://api.reliefweb.int/v1/references/career-categories. Optionally leave blank for automatic tagging by AI based on the job's title and body.

theme.description: Job theme(s) as a list of IDs from https://api.reliefweb.int/v1/references/themes. Optionally leave blank for automatic tagging by AI based on the job's title and body.
